channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Alaska Airlines grounds flights at Seattle briefly due to tech outage
item.description: Alaska Airlines says it halted its flights in Seattle briefly on Sunday night due to a technology problem that was resolved by about 10 p.m. Pacific Daylight Time.

item.title: The Fed sees its inflation fight as a success. Will the public eventually agree?
item.description: With its larger-than-usual half-point cut to its key interest rate last week, the Federal Reserve underscored its belief that itâ€™s all but conquered inflation after three long years.

item.title: Families from Tennessee to California seek humanitarian parole for adopted children in Haiti
item.description: Esai Reed, at only 6 years old, has endured three emergency evacuations from orphanages across Haiti as gangs pillage and plunder their way through once peaceful communities.
